content:
I deployed something to Fly.io for the first time this morning, and already I bloody love it. The tooling just works beautifully. I wanted to share it here as obviously Changelog had some influence in my decision to give them a go :big_smile:

I'm kinda hoping to use Rebel Alliance type services for this project rather than Big Cloud, and it's off to a great start.
I should second it, definitely investigated after hearing so much on change log and hopefully lining it up for my next project

The only thing I have deployed on fly so far is my bookmark manager Linkding.
Easy to get up and running, and since it does not need much it free as the bill is under $5 every month. :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
